review: I was disappointed with the Amazon Fire TV Stick because I guess I misunderstood what it was for. I was under the impression that it was going to bring me other movie/tv channels without charging for each one. I am returning it. I thought it would be some kind "antenna" to bring in more channels than I am getting, but I was wrong.
